question: Which schedule of Indian constitution contains languages?
explanation: Official Languages of the Republic of India are listed in the 8th schedule. This schedule had originally 14 languages but currently has 22 languages as follows:  1. Assamese 2. Bengali 3. Bodo 4. Dogri 5. Gujarati 6. Hindi 7. Kannada 8. Kashmiri 9. Konkani 10. Maithili 11. Malayalam 12. Manipuri 13. Marathi 14. Nepali 15. Odia 16. Punjabi 17. Sanskrit 18. Santali 19. Sindhi 20. Tamil 21. Telugu 22. Urdu
